content: this pattern is for the advanced beginner two or more colors would make a very pretty square stitches used single_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet treble_crochet v-st shell http //www lookatwhatimade net/crafts/yarn/crochet/block-a-week-cal-2014/block-8-cocoa-puff-photo-tutorial/ if you need a little extra help check out this awesome tutorial that was done up by dedri thank you dedri for allowing me to share this with others
